plan_overview: We will embark on a 22-week journey, starting with a 9-week Base phase to safely increase your aerobic capacity and build resilience after your mild shin splints. This will be followed by a 7-week Build phase to introduce marathon-specific workouts, culminating in a 3-week Peak phase for your longest runs and highest mileage before a well-deserved 3-week Taper to get you to the marathon start line feeling strong and prepared.

phases.key_focus: Gradual increase in aerobic volume and long run distance, reinforce running form, strengthen supporting muscles.
Introduce marathon-specific workouts (e.g., tempo, long runs with marathon pace segments), continue progressive long run development.
Highest volume and intensity, longest runs, fine-tune race pace and nutrition strategies.
Reduce volume significantly, maintain race-specific intensity, prioritize recovery and mental preparation.
